### Additional packages

This course uses a few other packages. Run the following lines of code to 
install them.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("drat")
drat::addRepo("jr-packages")
install.packages("jrShiny")
```

The command

```{r, message=FALSE}
library("jrShiny")
```
should run in the console window.
